greeting.text:
This is a <{I made dis!|glorious}> dialogue system.
We all know that it is and that it will be that forever. It is known.

message.speaker: Jamal
message.text: Thanks for trying this out, <{That's you!|friendo.}>
Even though this is a <big deal,> you've proven to be worthy of such trust and this bond grows only tighter still.

message.speaker: Jamal
message.text: Well done, you've solved the puzzle!

message.speaker: Jamal
message.text: Doesn't mean I want to talk with you about the weather, though. Still, thanks for trying this out.

message.speaker: Jamal
message.text: If you're wondering why there is so much text here, that is because I am currently testing loading all this from JSONs and I'm just packing a lot of stuff in here.
You are now in a new (recursive) tree. Don't go too <{No seriously, don't.|deep.}>
You are now in a new (recursive) tree. Don't go too <{No seriously, don't.|deep.}>
